name: report-portal-backend
description: 1. Copy this project folder to your machine or download the zip. 2. Create a `.env` file in the project root (see `.env.example`). 3. Install dependencies:    ```    npm install    ``` 4. Start MongoDB (local or Atlas) and update `MONGO_URI` in `.env`. 5. Start the server:    ```    npm run dev    ``` 6. Open your frontend and point fetch calls to `http://localhost:5000/api/...`
